sentences.english: The first, this coming Jan. 1, is a ban on caging egg-laying hens.
sentences.chinese: 明年1月1號首先被禁止的是籠子飼養的產蛋雞。

sentences.english: Avian leukosis in egg-type chickens is infectious neoplastic disease caused by avian leukosis viruse subgroup J( ALV-J).
sentences.chinese: 蛋雞J亞羣禽白血病是病毒引起的腫瘤性傳染病。

sentences.english: Is a hen who seldom lay eggs a good layer?
sentences.chinese: 不常下蛋的雞是好蛋雞嗎？

sentences.english: The native chicken marking and mating technique is belongs to the field of domestic bird genetic technique.
sentences.chinese: 土種蛋雞標識配套技術，屬於家禽遺傳技術領域。

sentences.english: Cage layer fatigue is a type of osteoporosis .
sentences.chinese: 籠養蛋雞疲勞症是骨質疏鬆症的一種類型。

sentences.english: Use only heat-treated soybean products in layer diets.
sentences.chinese: 對產蛋雞，只使用加熱工藝生產的豆粕。

sentences.english: Effect of Se probiotics on lipid metabolism in hens were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了富硒益生菌對蛋雞脂代謝的影響。

sentences.english: Do not feed gallic acid or tannic acid to laying hens.
sentences.chinese: 在產蛋雞日糧中不要使用沒食子酸和單寧酸。

sentences.english: In addition, the half step cage facilities are suitable.
sentences.chinese: 採用半階梯式蛋雞籠養設備較適宜。

sentences.english: This is the first confirmed at the molecular level that avian leukosis subgroup J occurred in the egg-type chickens in the world.
sentences.chinese: 這是國內外首次從分子水平證明蛋雞J亞羣禽白血病。

definition: chicken raised for meat/broiler/(computing) zombie/infected computer in a botnet
on call/always available/ready at all times
variant of 訂單|订单[ding4 dan1]
black-boned chicken/silky fowl/silkie/Gallus gallus domesticus Brisson/see also 烏骨雞|乌骨鸡[wu1 gu3 ji1]
Chutien township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
(bird species of China) black kite (Milvus migrans)
